patthana1.2:182.10: asaññasattānaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā … pe …

patthana1.2:489.1: Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ sahajāto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—

patthana1.2:489.3: Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ sahajāto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.2:489.5: Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ sahajāto kusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana1.2:489.6: kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ sahajātā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, tayo khandhe sahajāto eko khandho cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe sahajātā dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ. #3

patthana1.2:490.3: Akusalaṃ dhammaṃ sahajāto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—

patthana1.2:491.2: vipākābyākataṃ kiriyābyākataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ sahajātā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, tayo khandhe sahajāto eko khandho cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe sahajātā dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ;

patthana1.2:491.4: khandhe sahajātaṃ vatthu, vatthuṃ sahajātā khandhā;
patthana1.2:491.5: ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ sahajātā tayo mahābhūtā, tayo mahābhūte sahajātaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ, dve mahābhūte sahajātā dve mahābhūtā, mahābhūte sahajātaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ. #1

patthana1.2:492.2: kusale khandhe ca mahābhūte ca sahajātaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #1

patthana1.2:504.8: asaññasattānaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ sahajātā tayo mahābhūtā … pe …
patthana1.2:508.1: Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare pañca, nasamanantare pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca.
patthana1.2:511.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare pañca, nasamanantare pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca.
patthana1.2:514.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dve, anantare dve, samanantare dve, sahajāte dve, aññamaññe dve, nissaye dve, upanissaye dve, purejāte dve, āsevane dve, kamme dve, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre dve, indriye dve, jhāne dve, magge ekaṃ, sampayutte dve, vippayutte dve, atthiyā dve, natthiyā dve, vigate dve, avigate dve.
patthana1.2:521.1: Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.2:521.2: kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe paccayā eko khandho, dve khandhe paccayā dve khandhā.
patthana1.2:521.3: Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.2:521.5: Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana1.2:521.6: kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, tayo khandhe paccayā eko khandho cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe paccayā dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ. #3
patthana1.2:522.1: Akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.2:522.2: akusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe paccayā eko khandho, dve khandhe paccayā dve khandhā.
patthana1.2:522.3: Akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.2:522.5: Akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā akusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana1.2:522.6: akusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, tayo khandhe paccayā eko khandho cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe paccayā dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ. #3
patthana1.2:523.1: Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.2:523.2: vipākābyākataṃ kiriyābyākataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, tayo khandhe paccayā eko khandho cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe paccayā dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ;
patthana1.2:523.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ, tayo khandhe paccayā eko khandho kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe paccayā dve khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ;
patthana1.2:523.4: khandhe paccayā vatthu, vatthuṃ paccayā khandhā;
patthana1.2:523.5: ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paccayā tayo mahābhūtā, tayo mahābhūte paccayā ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ, dve mahābhūte paccayā dve mahābhūtā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ;
patthana1.2:524.1: Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.2:525.1: Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.2:526.1: Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana1.2:526.2: vatthuṃ paccayā kusalā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #4
patthana1.2:527.1: Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā akusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana1.2:527.2: vatthuṃ paccayā akusalā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #5
patthana1.2:528.1: Kusalañca abyākatañca dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.2:528.2: kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā eko khandho, dve khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā.
patthana1.2:528.3: Kusalañca abyākatañca dhammaṃ paccayā abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.2:528.4: kusale khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
patthana1.2:528.5: Kusalañca abyākatañca dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana1.2:528.6: kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā eko khandho, dve khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā, kusale khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #3

patthana1.2:603.5: Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā abyākato dhammo uppajjati vippayuttapaccayā—
patthana1.2:603.6: kusale khandhe paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, khandhe vippayuttapaccayā, kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti vippayuttapaccayā—
patthana1.2:603.7: kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe paccayā dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, khandhā vatthuṃ vippayuttapaccayā, cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ khandhe vippayuttapaccayā. #3
patthana1.2:604.1: Akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā akusalo dhammo uppajjati vippayuttapaccayā—
patthana1.2:604.2: akusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe paccayā dve khandhā, vatthuṃ vippayuttapaccayā.
patthana1.2:604.5: Akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā abyākato dhammo uppajjati vippayuttapaccayā—
patthana1.2:604.6: akusale khandhe paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, khandhe vippayuttapaccayā.
patthana1.2:604.7: Akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā akusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti vippayuttapaccayā—
patthana1.2:604.8: akusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe paccayā dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, khandhā vatthuṃ vippayuttapaccayā, cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ khandhe vippayuttapaccayā. #3
patthana1.2:605.1: Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā abyākato dhammo uppajjati vippayuttapaccayā—
patthana1.2:605.2: vipākābyākataṃ kiriyābyākataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe paccayā dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, khandhā vatthuṃ vippayuttapaccayā, cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ khandhe vippayuttapaccayā, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe paccayā dve khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ, khandhā vatthuṃ vippayuttapaccayā, kaṭattārūpaṃ khandhe vippayuttapaccayā, khandhe paccayā vatthu, vatthuṃ paccayā khandhā, khandhā vatthuṃ vippayuttapaccayā, vatthu khandhe vippayuttapaccayā;
patthana1.2:605.9: mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ khandhe vippayuttapaccayā;
patthana1.2:605.13: vatthuṃ paccayā vipākābyākatā kiriyābyākatā khandhā, vatthuṃ vippayuttapaccayā. #1
patthana1.2:606.1: Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo dhammo uppajjati vippayuttapaccayā—
patthana1.2:606.2: vatthuṃ paccayā kusalā khandhā, vatthuṃ vippayuttapaccayā. #2
patthana1.2:607.1: Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā akusalo dhammo uppajjati vippayuttapaccayā—
patthana1.2:607.2: vatthuṃ paccayā akusalā khandhā, vatthuṃ vippayuttapaccayā. #3
patthana1.2:608.1: Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti vippayuttapaccayā—
patthana1.2:608.2: vatthuṃ paccayā kusalā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, khandhā vatthuṃ vippayuttapaccayā, cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ khandhe vippayuttapaccayā. #4
patthana1.2:609.1: Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā akusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti vippayuttapaccayā—
patthana1.2:609.2: vatthuṃ paccayā akusalā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, khandhā vatthuṃ vippayuttapaccayā.
patthana1.2:610.1: Kusalañca abyākatañca dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo dhammo uppajjati vippayuttapaccayā—
patthana1.2:610.2: kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā eko khandho, dve khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā, vatthuṃ vippayuttapaccayā.
patthana1.2:610.3: Kusalañca abyākatañca dhammaṃ paccayā abyākato dhammo uppajjati vippayuttapaccayā—
patthana1.2:610.4: kusale khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, khandhe vippayuttapaccayā.
patthana1.2:610.5: Kusalañca abyākatañca dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti vippayuttapaccayā—
patthana1.2:610.6: kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā eko khandho, dve khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā, kusale khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, khandhā vatthuṃ vippayuttapaccayā, cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ khandhe vippayuttapaccayā. #3
patthana1.2:611.1: Akusalañca abyākatañca dhammaṃ paccayā akusalo dhammo uppajjati vippayuttapaccayā—
patthana1.2:611.2: akusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā, vatthuṃ vippayuttapaccayā.
patthana1.2:611.5: Akusalañca abyākatañca dhammaṃ paccayā abyākato dhammo uppajjati vippayuttapaccayā—
patthana1.2:611.6: akusale khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, khandhe vippayuttapaccayā.
patthana1.2:611.7: Akusalañca abyākatañca dhammaṃ paccayā akusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti vippayuttapaccayā—
patthana1.2:611.8: akusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhā, akusale khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, khandhā vatthuṃ vippayuttapaccayā, cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ khandhe vippayuttapaccayā. #3
patthana1.2:613.1: Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo dhammo uppajjati atthipaccayā … pe ….
patthana1.2:613.3: (Atthipaccayā sahajātapaccayasadisaṃ kātabbaṃ. Natthipaccayā vigatapaccayā ārammaṇapaccayasadisaṃ, avigatapaccayā sahajātapaccayasadisaṃ.)
patthana1.2:616.1: Hetuyā sattarasa, ārammaṇe satta, adhipatiyā sattarasa, anantare satta, samanantare satta, sahajāte sattarasa, aññamaññe satta, nissaye sattarasa, upanissaye satta, purejāte satta, āsevane satta, kamme sattarasa, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre sattarasa, indriye sattarasa, jhāne sattarasa, magge sattarasa, sampayutte satta, vippayutte sattarasa, atthiyā sattarasa, natthiyā satta, vigate satta, avigate sattarasa.
patthana1.2:618.1: Hetupaccayā ārammaṇe satta, adhipatiyā sattarasa, anantare satta, samanantare satta, sahajāte sattarasa … pe … avigate sattarasa.
patthana1.2:620.1: Hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā adhipatiyā satta (sabbattha satta) vipāke ekaṃ, avigate satta … pe ….
patthana1.2:622.1: Hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā adhipatipaccayā anantarapaccayā samanantarapaccayā sahajātapaccayā aññamaññapaccayā nissayapaccayā upanissayapaccayā purejātapaccayā āsevanapaccayā kamme satta, āhāre satta … pe … avigate satta … pe ….
patthana1.2:624.1: Hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā … pe … purejātapaccayā āsevanapaccayā kammapaccayā āhārapaccayā … pe … vigatapaccayā avigate satta.
patthana1.2:626.1: Hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā … pe … purejātapaccayā kammapaccayā vipākapaccayā āhāre ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana1.2:628.1: Hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā … pe … purejātapaccayā kammapaccayā vipākapaccayā āhārapaccayā … pe … vigatapaccayā avigate ekaṃ.
patthana1.2:630.1: Ārammaṇapaccayā hetuyā satta, adhipatiyā satta … pe …
patthana1.2:638.1: Āsevanapaccayā hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe satta, adhipatiyā satta, anantare satta, samanantare satta, sahajāte satta, aññamaññe satta, nissaye satta, upanissaye satta, purejāte satta, kamme satta, āhāre satta, indriye satta, jhāne satta, magge satta, sampayutte satta, vippayutte satta, atthiyā satta, natthiyā satta, vigate satta, avigate satta … pe ….
patthana1.2:640.1: Kammapaccayā … pe … vipākapaccayā hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ, anantare ekaṃ, samanantare ekaṃ, sahajāte ekaṃ, aññamaññe ekaṃ, nissaye ekaṃ, upanissaye ekaṃ, purejāte ekaṃ, kamme ekaṃ, āhāre ekaṃ, indriye ekaṃ, jhāne ekaṃ, magge ekaṃ, sampayutte ekaṃ, vippayutte ekaṃ, atthiyā ekaṃ, natthiyā ekaṃ, vigate ekaṃ, avigate ekaṃ … pe ….
patthana1.2:643.1: Avigatapaccayā hetuyā sattarasa, ārammaṇe satta … pe … vigate satta.
patthana1.2:648.1: Akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā akusalo dhammo uppajjati na hetupaccayā—
patthana1.2:648.2: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana1.2:649.1: Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā abyākato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana1.2:649.2: ahetukaṃ vipākābyākataṃ kiriyābyākataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe paccayā dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ;
patthana1.2:649.5: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe paccayā dve khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ;
patthana1.2:649.8: khandhe paccayā vatthu, vatthuṃ paccayā khandhā;
patthana1.2:649.9: ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paccayā tayo mahābhūtā … pe …
patthana1.2:649.11: mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ;
patthana1.2:649.15: asaññasattānaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paccayā tayo mahābhūtā … pe …
patthana1.2:649.21: vatthuṃ paccayā ahetukā vipākābyākatā kiriyābyākatā khandhā. #1
patthana1.2:650.1: Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana1.2:651.1: Akusalañca abyākatañca dhammaṃ paccayā akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana1.2:651.2: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana1.2:653.1: Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā abyākato dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana1.2:656.1: Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.2:658.13: kāyāyatanaṃ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā vipākābyākatā kiriyābyākatā khandhā.
patthana1.2:659.1: Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā, vatthuṃ paccayā kusalā khandhā … pe ….
patthana1.2:662.1: Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā abyākato dhammo uppajjati naanantarapaccayā …
patthana1.2:665.1: Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo dhammo uppajjati napacchājātapaccayā …
patthana1.2:668.1: Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—
patthana1.2:669.1: Akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā akusalo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—
patthana1.2:670.1: Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā abyākato dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā, kiriyābyākate khandhe paccayā kiriyābyākatā cetanā;
patthana1.2:671.1: Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—
patthana1.2:672.1: Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā akusalo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—
patthana1.2:673.1: Kusalañca abyākatañca dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—
patthana1.2:673.2: kusale khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā kusalā cetanā. #1
patthana1.2:674.1: Akusalañca abyākatañca dhammaṃ paccayā akusalo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—
patthana1.2:674.2: akusale khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā akusalā cetanā. #1
patthana1.2:676.1: Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo dhammo uppajjati navipākapaccayā—
patthana1.2:678.1: Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā abyākato dhammo uppajjati navipākapaccayā—
patthana1.2:678.2: kiriyābyākataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe paccayā dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paccayā tayo mahābhūtā … pe …
patthana1.2:678.10: asaññasattānaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paccayā tayo mahābhūtā … pe …
patthana1.2:678.12: mahābhūte paccayā kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā kiriyābyākatā khandhā.
patthana1.2:679.1: Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo dhammo uppajjati navipākapaccayā—
patthana1.2:682.1: Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā abyākato dhammo uppajjati naāhārapaccayā …
patthana1.2:683.1: Avasesaṃ yathā paṭiccavāre paccanīyaṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
patthana1.2:685.4: kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā abyākato dhammo uppajjati novigatapaccayā—
patthana1.2:689.1: Nahetuyā cattāri, na ārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā sattarasa, naanantare pañca, nasamanantare pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte sattarasa, naāsevane sattarasa, nakamme satta, navipāke sattarasa, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca.
patthana1.2:693.1: Nahetupaccayā naārammaṇe ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā cattāri, naanantare ekaṃ, nasamanantare ekaṃ, naaññamaññe ekaṃ, naupanissaye ekaṃ, napurejāte dve, napacchājāte cattāri, naāsevane cattāri, nakamme ekaṃ, navipāke cattāri, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte ekaṃ, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā ekaṃ, novigate ekaṃ.
patthana1.2:695.1: Nahetupaccayā naārammaṇapaccayā naadhipatiyā ekaṃ, naanantare ekaṃ, nasamanantare ekaṃ, (sabbattha ekaṃ) nonatthiyā ekaṃ, novigate ekaṃ … pe ….
patthana1.2:697.1: Naārammaṇapaccayā nahetuyā ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā pañca, naanantare pañca, nasamanantare pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte pañca, napacchājāte pañca, naāsevane pañca, nakamme ekaṃ, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte ekaṃ, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca.
patthana1.2:699.1: Naārammaṇapaccayā nahetupaccayā naadhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … novigate ekaṃ … pe ….
patthana1.2:701.1: Naadhipatipaccayā nahetuyā cattāri, naārammaṇe pañca, naanantare pañca, nasamanantare pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte sattarasa, naāsevane sattarasa, nakamme satta, navipāke sattarasa, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca.
patthana1.2:703.1: Naadhipatipaccayā nahetupaccayā naārammaṇe ekaṃ, naanantare ekaṃ, nasamanantare ekaṃ, naaññamaññe ekaṃ, naupanissaye ekaṃ, napurejāte dve, napacchājāte cattāri, naāsevane cattāri, nakamme ekaṃ, navipāke cattāri, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte ekaṃ, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā ekaṃ, novigate ekaṃ.
patthana1.2:705.1: Naadhipatipaccayā nahetupaccayā naārammaṇapaccayā naanantare ekaṃ (sabbattha ekaṃ) … pe ….
patthana1.2:709.1: Napurejātapaccayā nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare pañca, nasamanantare pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, naupanissaye pañca, napacchājāte satta, naāsevane satta, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke satta, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca.
patthana1.2:711.1: Napurejātapaccayā nahetupaccayā naārammaṇe ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā dve, naanantare ekaṃ, nasamanantare ekaṃ, naaññamaññe ekaṃ, naupanissaye ekaṃ, napacchājāte dve, naāsevane dve, nakamme ekaṃ, navipāke dve, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte ekaṃ, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā ekaṃ, novigate ekaṃ.
patthana1.2:713.1: Napurejātapaccayā nahetupaccayā naārammaṇapaccayā naadhipatiyā ekaṃ (sabbattha ekaṃ) novigate ekaṃ … pe ….
patthana1.2:715.1: Napacchājātapaccayā … pe … naāsevanapaccayā nahetuyā cattāri, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā sattarasa, naanantare pañca, nasamanantare pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte sattarasa, nakamme satta, navipāke sattarasa, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca.

patthana1.2:922.1: Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ nissāya kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.2:922.2: kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ nissāya tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe nissāya eko khandho, dve khandhe nissāya dve khandhā.

patthana1.2:922.5: Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ nissāya kusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana1.2:922.6: Kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ nissāya tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, tayo khandhe nissāya eko khandho cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe nissāya dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ. #3

patthana1.2:923.5: Akusalaṃ dhammaṃ nissāya abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.2:923.7: Akusalaṃ dhammaṃ nissāya akusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana1.2:923.8: akusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ nissāya tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe nissāya dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ. #3

patthana1.2:924.2: vipākābyākataṃ kiriyābyākataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ nissāya tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, tayo khandhe nissāya eko khandho cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe nissāya dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ;

patthana1.2:924.4: khandhe nissāya vatthu, vatthuṃ nissāya khandhā;
patthana1.2:924.5: ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ nissāya tayo mahābhūtā, tayo mahābhūte nissāya ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ, dve mahābhūte nissāya dve mahābhūtā, mahābhūte nissāya cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ;
patthana1.2:925.1: Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ nissāya kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.2:926.1: Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ nissāya akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.2:927.1: Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ nissāya kusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana1.2:927.2: vatthuṃ nissāya kusalā khandhā, mahābhūte nissāya cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #4

patthana1.2:929.2: kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca nissāya tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca vatthuñca nissāya dve khandhā.

patthana1.2:934.1: Hetuyā sattarasa, ārammaṇe satta, adhipatiyā sattarasa, anantare satta, samanantare satta, sahajāte sattarasa, aññamaññe satta, nissaye sattarasa, upanissaye satta, purejāte satta, āsevane satta, kamme sattarasa, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre sattarasa, indriye sattarasa, jhāne sattarasa, magge sattarasa, sampayutte satta, vippayutte sattarasa, atthiyā sattarasa, natthiyā satta, vigate satta, avigate sattarasa.

patthana1.2:1162.1: Naadhipatipaccayā hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana1.2:1164.1: Naadhipatipaccayā nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dve … pe … avigate dve.
patthana1.2:1166.1: Napurejātapaccayā hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … āsevane tīṇi, kamme tīṇi, vipāke ekaṃ.
patthana1.2:1167.1: (Sabbāni padāni vitthāretabbāni, imāni alikhitesu padesu tīṇi pañhā. Napurejātamūlake nahetuyā ṭhitena āsevane ca magge ca eko pañho kātabbo, avasesāni nahetupaccayasadisāni. Napacchājātapaccayā paripuṇṇaṃ naadhipatipaccayasadisaṃ.)
patthana1.2:1169.1: Nakammapaccayā hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare tīṇi, samanantare tīṇi, sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye tīṇi, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā tīṇi, natthiyā tīṇi, vigate tīṇi, avigate tīṇi.
patthana1.2:1171.1: Nakammapaccayā nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ, anantare ekaṃ, samanantare ekaṃ, sahajāte ekaṃ, aññamaññe ekaṃ, nissaye ekaṃ, upanissaye ekaṃ, purejāte ekaṃ, āsevane ekaṃ, āhāre ekaṃ, indriye ekaṃ, jhāne ekaṃ, sampayutte ekaṃ, vippayutte ekaṃ, atthiyā ekaṃ, natthiyā ekaṃ, vigate ekaṃ, avigate ekaṃ … pe ….
patthana1.2:1173.1: Nakammapaccayā nahetupaccayā naadhipatipaccayā napurejātapaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ, anantare ekaṃ, samanantare ekaṃ, sahajāte ekaṃ, aññamaññe ekaṃ, nissaye ekaṃ, upanissaye ekaṃ, āhāre ekaṃ, indriye ekaṃ, jhāne ekaṃ, sampayutte ekaṃ, atthiyā ekaṃ, natthiyā ekaṃ, vigate ekaṃ, avigate ekaṃ.
patthana1.2:1178.1: Navipākapaccayā nahetupaccayā naadhipatipaccayā napurejātapaccayā ārammaṇe dve, anantare dve, samanantare dve, sahajāte dve, aññamaññe dve, nissaye dve, upanissaye dve, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme dve, āhāre dve, indriye dve, jhāne dve, magge ekaṃ, sampayutte dve, atthiyā dve, natthiyā dve, vigate dve, avigate dve.
patthana1.2:1181.1: Najhānapaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ, anantare ekaṃ, samanantare ekaṃ, sahajāte ekaṃ, aññamaññe ekaṃ, nissaye ekaṃ, upanissaye ekaṃ, purejāte ekaṃ, kamme ekaṃ, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre ekaṃ, indriye ekaṃ, sampayutte ekaṃ, vippayutte ekaṃ, atthiyā ekaṃ, natthiyā ekaṃ, vigate ekaṃ, avigate ekaṃ … pe ….
patthana1.2:1183.1: Najhānapaccayā nahetupaccayā naadhipatipaccayā napacchājātapaccayā naāsevanapaccayā namaggapaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ, anantare ekaṃ, samanantare ekaṃ, sahajāte ekaṃ, aññamaññe ekaṃ, nissaye ekaṃ, upanissaye ekaṃ, purejāte ekaṃ, kamme ekaṃ, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre ekaṃ, indriye ekaṃ, sampayutte ekaṃ, vippayutte ekaṃ, atthiyā ekaṃ, natthiyā ekaṃ, vigate ekaṃ, avigate ekaṃ.
patthana1.2:1185.1: Namaggapaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ, anantare ekaṃ, samanantare ekaṃ, sahajāte ekaṃ, aññamaññe ekaṃ, nissaye ekaṃ, upanissaye ekaṃ, purejāte ekaṃ, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme ekaṃ, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre ekaṃ, indriye ekaṃ, jhāne ekaṃ, sampayutte ekaṃ, vippayutte ekaṃ, atthiyā ekaṃ, natthiyā ekaṃ, vigate ekaṃ, avigate ekaṃ … pe ….
patthana1.2:1187.1: Namaggapaccayā nahetupaccayā naadhipatipaccayā napurejātapaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ, anantare ekaṃ, samanantare ekaṃ, sahajāte ekaṃ, aññamaññe ekaṃ, nissaye ekaṃ, upanissaye ekaṃ, kamme ekaṃ, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre ekaṃ, indriye ekaṃ, jhāne ekaṃ, sampayutte ekaṃ, vippayutte ekaṃ, atthiyā ekaṃ, natthiyā ekaṃ, vigate ekaṃ, avigate ekaṃ.
patthana1.2:1191.1: Navippayuttapaccayā hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare tīṇi, samanantare tīṇi, sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme tīṇi, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre tīṇi, indriye tīṇi, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte tīṇi, atthiyā tīṇi, natthiyā tīṇi, vigate tīṇi, avigate tīṇi.
patthana1.2:1193.1: Navippayuttapaccayā nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dve, anantare dve, samanantare dve, sahajāte dve, aññamaññe dve, nissaye dve, upanissaye dve, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme dve, āhāre dve, indriye dve, jhāne dve, magge ekaṃ, sampayutte dve, atthiyā dve, natthiyā dve, vigate dve, avigate dve … pe ….
patthana1.2:1195.1: Navippayuttapaccayā nahetupaccayā naadhipatipaccayā napurejātapaccayā napacchājātapaccayā (naāsevanapaccayamūlakampi nahetumūlakasadisaṃ.)
patthana1.2:1195.2: Nakammapaccayā navipākapaccayā namaggapaccayā (imāni tīṇi mūlāni ekasadisāni) ārammaṇe ekaṃ, anantare ekaṃ, samanantare ekaṃ, sahajāte ekaṃ, aññamaññe ekaṃ, nissaye ekaṃ, upanissaye ekaṃ, āhāre ekaṃ, indriye ekaṃ, jhāne ekaṃ, sampayutte ekaṃ, atthiyā ekaṃ, natthiyā ekaṃ, vigate ekaṃ, avigate ekaṃ.
patthana1.2:1201.1: Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ sampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.2:1201.2: kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ sampayuttā tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe sampayutto eko khandho, dve khandhe sampayuttā dve khandhā. #1
patthana1.2:1202.1: Akusalaṃ dhammaṃ sampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.2:1202.2: akusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ sampayuttā tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe sampayutto eko khandho, dve khandhe sampayuttā dve khandhā. #1
patthana1.2:1203.1: Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ sampayutto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.2:1203.2: vipākābyākataṃ kiriyābyākataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ sampayuttā tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe sampayutto eko khandho, dve khandhe sampayuttā dve khandhā;
patthana1.2:1203.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ sampayuttā tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe sampayutto eko khandho, dve khandhe sampayuttā dve khandhā.
patthana1.2:1206.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare tīṇi, samanantare tīṇi, sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme tīṇi, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre tīṇi, indriye tīṇi, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā tīṇi, natthiyā tīṇi, vigate tīṇi, avigate tīṇi.
patthana1.2:1211.1: Akusalaṃ dhammaṃ sampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana1.2:1211.2: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe sampayutto vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana1.2:1212.1: Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ sampayutto abyākato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana1.2:1212.2: ahetukaṃ vipākābyākataṃ kiriyābyākataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ sampayuttā tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe sampayutto eko khandho, dve khandhe sampayuttā dve khandhā;
patthana1.2:1212.3: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ sampayuttā tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe sampayutto eko khandho, dve khandhe sampayuttā dve khandhā.
patthana1.2:1215.1: Nahetuyā dve, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, napurejāte tīṇi, napacchājāte tīṇi, naāsevane tīṇi, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke tīṇi, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, navippayutte tīṇi.
patthana1.2:1219.1: Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā tīṇi, napurejāte tīṇi, napacchājāte tīṇi, naāsevane tīṇi, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi.
patthana1.2:1223.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dve, anantare dve, samanantare dve, sahajāte dve, aññamaññe dve, nissaye dve, upanissaye dve, purejāte dve, āsevane dve, kamme dve, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre dve, indriye dve, jhāne dve, magge ekaṃ, sampayutte dve, vippayutte dve, atthiyā dve, natthiyā dve, vigate dve, avigate dve.
patthana1.2:1230.1: Kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.2:1230.2: kusalā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1230.3: Kusalo dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.2:1230.4: kusalā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1230.5: Kusalo dhammo kusalassa ca abyākatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.2:1230.6: kusalā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.2:1231.1: Akusalo dhammo akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.2:1231.2: akusalā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1231.3: Akusalo dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.2:1231.4: akusalā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1231.5: Akusalo dhammo akusalassa ca abyākatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.2:1231.6: akusalā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.2:1232.1: Abyākato dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.2:1232.2: vipākābyākatā kiriyābyākatā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana1.2:1232.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākatā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.2:1234.1: Kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.2:1234.2: dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ paccavekkhati, sekkhā gotrabhuṃ paccavekkhanti, vodānaṃ paccavekkhanti, sekkhā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, sekkhā vā puthujjanā vā kusalaṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, cetopariyañāṇena kusalacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānanti.
patthana1.2:1234.5: Kusalā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammupagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.2:1235.1: Kusalo dhammo akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.2:1235.2: dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ assādeti abhinandati;
patthana1.2:1235.3: taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, uddhaccaṃ uppajjati, domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.2:1235.5: taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, uddhaccaṃ uppajjati, domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.2:1235.7: taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, uddhaccaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.2:1236.1: Kusalo dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.2:1236.6: Sekkhā vā puthujjanā vā kusalaṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, kusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati.
patthana1.2:1236.8: taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, uddhaccaṃ uppajjati, domanassaṃ uppajjati, akusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati.
patthana1.2:1236.9: Ākāsānañcāyatanakusalaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanavipākassa ca, kiriyassa ca ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1236.10: Ākiñcaññāyatanakusalaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanavipākassa ca, kiriyassa ca ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1236.11: Kusalā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.2:1237.1: Akusalo dhammo akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.2:1237.3: taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, uddhaccaṃ uppajjati, domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.2:1237.5: taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, uddhaccaṃ uppajjati, domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.2:1237.6: Vicikicchaṃ ārabbha vicikicchā uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, uddhaccaṃ uppajjati, domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.2:1237.7: Uddhaccaṃ ārabbha uddhaccaṃ uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.2:1237.8: Domanassaṃ ārabbha domanassaṃ uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, uddhaccaṃ uppajjati. #1
patthana1.2:1238.1: Akusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.2:1238.2: sekkhā pahīne kilesepaccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilesepaccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti, sekkhā vā puthujjanā vā akusalaṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, cetopariyañāṇena akusalacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānanti.
patthana1.2:1238.3: Akusalā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammupagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.2:1239.1: Akusalo dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.2:1239.2: arahā pahīne kilese paccavekkhati, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānāti, akusalaṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, cetopariyañāṇena akusalacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti, sekkhā vā puthujjanā vā akusalaṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, kusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati.
patthana1.2:1239.4: taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, uddhaccaṃ uppajjati, domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.2:1239.6: Akusalā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammupagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.2:1240.1: Abyākato dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.2:1240.4: Arahā cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati.
patthana1.2:1240.15: vipākābyākate kiriyābyākate khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, cetopariyañāṇena vipākābyākatakiriyābyākatacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti.
patthana1.2:1240.23: Abyākatā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.2:1241.1: Abyākato dhammo kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.2:1241.3: Nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa vodānassa maggassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1241.4: Sekkhā vā puthujjanā vā cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti.
patthana1.2:1241.15: vipākābyākate kiriyābyākate khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passanti, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇanti, cetopariyañāṇena vipākābyākatakiriyābyākatacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānanti.
patthana1.2:1241.16: Abyākatā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa cetopariyañāṇassa pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa anāgataṃsañāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.2:1242.1: Abyākato dhammo akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.2:1242.3: taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, uddhaccaṃ uppajjati, domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.2:1242.15: taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, uddhaccaṃ uppajjati, domanassaṃ uppajjati. #3
patthana1.2:1244.1: Kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—

patthana1.2:1291.17: asaññasattānaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ tiṇṇannaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ nissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1291.18: Tayo mahābhūtā ekassa mahābhūtassa nissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1291.19: Dve mahābhūtā dvinnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ nissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1291.29: Vatthu vipākābyākatānaṃ kiriyābyākatānaṃ khandhānaṃ nissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1292.1: Abyākato dhammo kusalassa dhammassa nissayapaccayena paccayo—

patthana1.2:1294.2: kusalo eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ nissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1294.3: Tayo khandhā ca vatthu ca ekassa khandhassa nissayapaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.2:1299.1: Kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.2:1300.2: dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā, taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, sekkhā gotrabhuṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, vodānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, sekkhā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.2:1301.2: purimā purimā kusalā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1302.2: saddhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ samādiyati, uposathakammaṃ karoti, jhānaṃ uppādeti, vipassanaṃ uppādeti, maggaṃ uppādeti, abhiññaṃ uppādeti, samāpattiṃ uppādeti.
patthana1.2:1302.9: paññaṃ upanissaya dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ samādiyati, uposathakammaṃ karoti, jhānaṃ uppādeti, vipassanaṃ uppādeti, maggaṃ uppādeti, abhiññaṃ uppādeti, samāpattiṃ uppādeti.
patthana1.2:1303.1: Paṭhamassa jhānassa parikammaṃ paṭhamassa jhānassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1303.2: Dutiyassa jhānassa parikammaṃ dutiyassa jhānassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1303.3: Tatiyassa jhānassa parikammaṃ tatiyassa jhānassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1303.4: Catutthassa jhānassa parikammaṃ catutthassa jhānassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1303.9: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ dutiyassa jhānassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1303.10: Dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ tatiyassa jhānassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1303.11: Tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ catutthassa jhānassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1303.16: Dibbassa cakkhussa parikammaṃ dibbassa cakkhussa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1303.17: Dibbāya sotadhātuyā parikammaṃ dibbāya sotadhātuyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1303.29: Paṭhamassa maggassa parikammaṃ paṭhamassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1303.30: Dutiyassa maggassa parikammaṃ dutiyassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1303.31: Tatiyassa maggassa parikammaṃ tatiyassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1303.32: Catutthassa maggassa parikammaṃ catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1303.33: Paṭhamo maggo dutiyassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1303.34: Dutiyo maggo tatiyassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1303.35: Tatiyo maggo catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1303.36: Sekkhā maggaṃ upanissāya anuppannaṃ samāpattiṃ uppādenti, uppannaṃ samāpajjanti, saṅkhāre aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti.
patthana1.2:1303.37: Maggo sekkhānaṃ atthappaṭisambhidāya, dhammappaṭisambhidāya, niruttippaṭisambhidāya, paṭibhānappaṭisambhidāya, ṭhānāṭhānakosallassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.2:1304.1: Kusalo dhammo akusalassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.2:1305.2: dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.2:1305.3: Pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.2:1305.4: Jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.2:1306.2: saddhaṃ upanissāya mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti.
patthana1.2:1306.9: paññaṃ upanissāya mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti.
patthana1.2:1307.1: Kusalo dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.2:1308.2: arahā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati.
patthana1.2:1309.5: nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakusalaṃ phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1310.2: saddhaṃ upanissāya attānaṃ ātāpeti paritāpeti, pariyiṭṭhimūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ paccanubhoti.
patthana1.2:1310.9: paññaṃ upanissāya attānaṃ ātāpeti paritāpeti, pariyiṭṭhimūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ paccanubhoti.
patthana1.2:1310.18: Arahā maggaṃ upanissāya anuppannaṃ kiriyasamāpattiṃ uppādeti, uppannaṃ samāpajjati, saṅkhāre aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati.
patthana1.2:1310.19: Maggo arahato atthappaṭisambhidāya, dhammappaṭisambhidāya, niruttippaṭisambhidāya, paṭibhānappaṭisambhidāya, ṭhānāṭhānakosallassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1311.1: Akusalo dhammo akusalassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.2:1312.2: rāgaṃ garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.2:1312.3: Diṭṭhiṃ garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.2:1313.2: purimā purimā akusalā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ akusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1314.2: rāgaṃ upanissāya pāṇaṃ hanati, adinnaṃ ādiyati, musā bhaṇati, pisuṇaṃ bhaṇati, pharusaṃ bhaṇati, samphaṃ palapati, sandhiṃ chindati, nillopaṃ harati, ekāgārikaṃ karoti, paripanthe tiṭṭhati, paradāraṃ gacchati, gāmaghātaṃ karoti, nigamaghātaṃ karoti, mātaraṃ jīvitā voropeti, pitaraṃ jīvitā voropeti, arahantaṃ jīvitā voropeti, duṭṭhena cittena tathāgatassa lohitaṃ uppādeti, saṃghaṃ bhindati.
patthana1.2:1315.1: Akusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1315.3: rāgaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ samādiyati, uposathakammaṃ karoti, jhānaṃ uppādeti, vipassanaṃ uppādeti, maggaṃ uppādeti, abhiññaṃ uppādeti, samāpattiṃ uppādeti.

patthana1.2:1315.23: Pāṇaṃ hantvā tassa paṭighātatthāya dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ samādiyati, uposathakammaṃ karoti, jhānaṃ uppādeti, vipassanaṃ uppādeti, maggaṃ uppādeti, abhiññaṃ uppādeti, samāpattiṃ uppādeti.
patthana1.2:1315.46: nigamaghātaṃ karitvā tassa paṭighātatthāya dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ samādiyati, uposathakammaṃ karoti, jhānaṃ uppādeti, vipassanaṃ uppādeti, maggaṃ uppādeti, abhiññaṃ uppādeti, samāpattiṃ uppādeti.
patthana1.2:1315.47: Mātaraṃ jīvitā voropetvā tassa paṭighātatthāya dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ samādiyati, uposathakammaṃ karoti.
patthana1.2:1315.52: duṭṭhena cittena tathāgatassa lohitaṃ uppādetvā … pe …

patthana1.2:1358.3: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākatā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1360.1: Abyākato dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.2:1360.2: vipākābyākato eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ vipākapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1360.3: Tayo khandhā ekassa khandhassa cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ vipākapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1360.4: Dve khandhā dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ vipākapaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.2:1360.6: Tayo khandhā ekassa khandhassa kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ vipākapaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.2:1410.19: asaññasattānaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ tiṇṇannaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.2:1411.2: arahā cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati …
patthana1.2:1411.21: vatthuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati;
patthana1.2:1411.35: Vatthu vipākābyākatānaṃ kiriyābyākatānaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1411.37: vipākābyākatā kiriyābyākatā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1412.1: Abyākato dhammo kusalassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1412.3: sekkhā vā puthujjanā vā cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti …
patthana1.2:1412.22: vatthuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passanti, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇanti.
patthana1.2:1413.1: Abyākato dhammo akusalassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1413.4: taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, uddhaccaṃ uppajjati, domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.2:1413.24: taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.2:1414.1: Kusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā kusalassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.2:1414.4: kusalo eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo … pe … dve khandhā ca vatthu ca dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.2:1415.1: Kusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā abyākatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.2:1415.4: kusalā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1415.6: kusalā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1415.7: Pacchājātā kusalā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.2:1416.1: Akusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā akusalassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.2:1416.4: akusalo eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1416.5: Tayo khandhā ca vatthu ca ekassa khandhassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.2:1416.6: Dve khandhā ca vatthu ca dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.2:1417.1: Akusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā abyākatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—

patthana1.2:1425.1: Kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa avigatapaccayena paccayo—

patthana1.2:2466.1: Naāhārapaccayā hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare satta, samanantare satta, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye terasa, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme dve, vipāke ekaṃ, indriye satta, jhāne satta, magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, natthiyā satta, vigate satta, avigate terasa … pe ….
